REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides beach access routes for mobility impaired persons
Summary: Provides that beach areas operated by the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation shall include beach access routes provided for mobility impaired persons.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.33, Pks & Rec L; amd ยง296, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the executive law, in relation to providing beach access routes for mobility impaired persons
